mapper.select: select td.*,s.securitiesName,s.securitiesType from((select sum(num) num,sum(netReceipts) netReceipts,sum(totalSum) totalSum,sum(commission) commission,max(securitiesId) securitiesId ,sum(brokerage) brokerage,sum(stamp) stamp,sum(transfer) transfer,sum(management) management,max(flag) flag,sum(security) security,max(transactionDataMode) transactionDataMode from transactionData where DATETIME=#{dateTime} group by SECURITIESID,flag)) td join securities s on td.securitiesId=s.SECURITIESID
